name: pure black youtube 6.12
description:
- black youtube with custom color links (don't use a dark color)
- pages fits the entire screen
- for fullwidth in video page use https://userstyles.org/styles/122276
- makes new player controls smaller
- animations and shadows

- this style may not work properly if you screen is smaller than 1366p, use https://userstyles.org/styles/122276 or the zoom keys

- Greasemonkey users - Edit line 7 on the script to:
// @run-at        document-end
                     - You will also need youtube center to disable SPF
additional_info:
- moved changelog to a comment in the style as it was over 10K characters

1 Year - 1448 downloads

style_settings.label: Background (must match your screen resolution or be tileable)
